originalText.text:
5/24- updating my review.  Apparently they don't know the meaning of 'unsubscribe' when it comes to emailing.  Just one more thing to add to an ever growing list of why no one should ever do business with this place.

If your not willing to give any kind of explanation and throw a 5 star rating up it's safe say you probably work for them or have some kind of vested interest. Shoddy company. You spend thousands of dollars on their products before you even start trading. They really only make money on the products they sell which are vague lower teir how to videos and manuals. After I finished everything I thought, "I could have gotten all this for free online." The best part is all the spam garbage emails they send you even after you unsubscribe.  Stay away from these shysters.

originalText.text:
Didn’t see a single profitable trader. Lots of big talkers and egos to stroke, but just looked like a bunch of people being taken advantage of with ridiculous fees.

The guys that worked there gave me the creeps and were reject salesman and “act as If you make money” posers.

How are these guys still in business? We trade for free now. Everyone offers commission free trades.

originalText.text: A good place to start your pro trading career with professional management team and supervisor Derrick not only a great trader with extensive knowledge and experience but also provides top notch training. Highly recommended if you can pass the series exam.

text.text: A good place to start your pro trading career with professional management team and supervisor Derrick not only a great trader with extensive knowledge and experience but also provides top notch training. Highly recommended if you can pass the series exam.

originalText.text: This company is like a Ponzi scam. The “senior” traders make their money by “training” new traders. If they actually can make a living by trading, why do they teach you? Because they can’t make their livings by trading, they make their livings by taking advantage of others.
